excerpt: A plant-based version of a classic sandwich!
instructions: Place the meatballs on a baking sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes or until heated through.
While the meatballs are cooking, heat the marinara sauce in a saucepan over medium heat.
Slice the sub rolls in half and place them on a baking sheet. Toast the rolls in the oven for 5-6 minutes or until lightly browned.
Once the meatballs are done cooking, place them in the marinara sauce and stir to coat.
Take the toasted rolls out of the oven and place the meatballs and marinara sauce on the bottom half of the roll. Top with vegan mozzarella and vegan parmesan cheese.
Return the baking sheet to the oven and broil on high for 2-3 minutes or until cheese is melted.
Remove the sub from the oven, top with fresh basil leaves, and serve immediately.
